field.name: summary
field.value: HtmlHelper.LinkTo produces invalid link when no extensions used

field.name: description
field.value:
I've got MonoRail configured to use no extensions, so I get addresses like: http://localhost:8080/admin/users
When I use output HtmlHelper.LinkTo("Edit","admin","EditUser",user.Id) it produces the following link: http://localhost:8080/admin/EditUser.?id=c30093b0-4b83-4b9f-ba34-bff35e54e607
notice the . after EditUser It looks like the methods somewhere assumes there must be an extension.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Use UrlHelper instead, HtmlHelper has been deprecated.
